name: Crappy Bird - A Multiplayer Adventure
description:
Online multiplayer. Stunning 3D graphics. Maddeningly addictive fun.

"The tap-to-rise genre has a new king." - Free Apps Arcade

Leaderboards? Crappy Bird has 'em. Birds as central characters? Crappy Bird has 'em. Enough features to technically qualify as a game? Crappy Bird has 'em.
